item.title: American Brewing: IBUs and ABV
item.description: beer <- read_csv("/home/datys/Downloads/beers.csv") ## Warning: Missing column names filled in: 'X1' [1] ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## X1 = col_integer(), ## abv = col_double(), ## ibu = col_double(), ## id = col_integer(), ## name = col_character(), ## style = col_character(), ## brewery_id = col_integer(), ## ounces = col_double() ## ) popular_beers <- beer %>% filter(style %in% c("American IPA", "American Brown Ale", "American Porter", "American Pale Ale (APA)", "Witbier", "American Amber / Red Ale", "American Blond Ale")) %>% filter(!
